```{r}
library(waffle)
library(extrafont)
```



```{r}
font_import()
fonts()[grep("Awesome5", fonts())]
loadfonts();
```

```{r}
	
waffle(c(50, 30, 15, 5), rows = 5, title = "Your basic waffle chart")
```
